net.middell.combo
Class TextResource.CSSURLRewriteFilterReader

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Reader
      net.middell.combo.TextResource.CSSURLRewriteFilterReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Readable
Enclosing class:
TextResource
protected class TextResource.CSSURLRewriteFilterReader
extends Reader

Filters CSS input from a reader in order to rewrite references to external resources.

References to external resources in CSS via url() are relative to the location of the CSS resource, which often results in them becoming invalid upon combination of resources. This filter uses the CSS resource's source URI to resolve external references against it on the fly.
